text: BBC v Harper Collins (2010) EWHC 2424 was a 2010 case in English law. The BBC asked that the courts stop HarperCollins from publishing a book by Ben Collins. In the book, Collins revealed that he was 'The Stig' on the BBC's Top Gear. The BBC did not want people to know this. The BBC lost the case. == References == Category:2010 in television Category:2010 in the United Kingdom Category:BBC
title: BBC v HarperCollins Publishers Ltd
